ComicInfo.Summary:
Dinah seems to have fallen asleep or been put into some sort of magical trance as when she opens her eyes, she now wears the form of a centaur and is soon approached by a very old, male centaur who promises her that he can help her, but that it will cost her, sex, and although reluctant at first she agrees to it in the end. After their lovemaking session, she awakes and learns that it was the centaur's seed that cured her, but it has also made her pregnant but different matters come at hand as Magdalena's problems come to the forefront and it is revealed she is over 700 years old as she sold her soul to the devil for youth and beauty and now that is gone, but they use spell to travel to another world deep below the earth where they hope to save Magdalena from her fate.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-31 13:02:29. [CVDB150095]
